sentences.en: C . in the room , telephone, terrace, hair dryer, VCD player.

sentences.en: Can you catalogue the VCD sets you sell and send me a copy?
sentences.cn: 你能不能把你们出售的VCD机编成目录送我一份?

sentences.en: Do you still have VCD programs?
He has his own VCD player.
I mean he took everything of any value : money, watches, TV, VCD, everything.
sentences.cn: 我是说他把值钱的东西都偷走了: 钱 、 手表 、 电视 、 VCD 、 所有东西.

sentences.en: Shell production of electronic products ( DVD, VCD ) and parts, household appliances and pieces of metal structures.
sentences.cn: 生产电子产品的外壳 ( DVD 、 VCD ) 和配件及家用电器金属结构件.

sentences.en: The new models of VCD sell like fun.
sentences.cn: 这些新型的VCD机销路好得不得了.

sentences.en: Then, Will VCD te substituted by DVD soon?
sentences.cn: 那么, VCD能否很快被DVD取代?

sentences.en: This action is caused in VCD and television industry blast a disturbance.
sentences.cn: 此举在VCD及彩电业界引起阵阵骚动.

sentences.en: This VCD can be returned for repair under warranty.
sentences.cn: VCD在保修期间可以退回维修.

sentences.en: Used in color TV, display, VCD sets , audio sets, etc.

sentences.en: VCD production this year increased by 50 % compared to the last year.
sentences.cn: 和去年相比,今年VCD的产量提高了50%.
